title: Failure to start
body:
**Describe the bug**
At startup, I get an empty white screen saying with title: "Waiting for networks".

**To Reproduce**
1. Install from flathub (flatpak)
2. Start the application

**Expected behavior**
I assume a login screen?

**Screenshots**
![teams](https://github.com/IsmaelMartinez/teams-for-linux/assets/1282478/5278d55b-9adc-4cb8-b62a-37394ddc7d99)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Linux
 - Installation package: Flathub
 - Version: 1.4.25

**Debug**

```bash
$ flatpak run com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux --webDebug  --appLogLevels=error,info,warn,debug
[DEBUG] configPath:,/lhome/apolgon/.var/app/com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux/config/teams-for-linux
[WARN] No config file found, using default values
[DEBUG] configFile:,[object Object]
[INFO] Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
LaunchProcess: failed to execvp:
xdg-settings
[INFO] App already running
Gtk-Message: 10:10:45.973: Failed to load module "xapp-gtk3-module"
[2:0415/101046.667005:ERROR:bus.cc(407)] Failed to connect to the bus: Failed to connect to socket /run/dbus/system_bus_socket: No such file or directory
[2:0415/101046.667269:ERROR:bus.cc(407)] Failed to connect to the bus: Failed to connect to socket /run/dbus/system_bus_socket: No such file or directory
[2:0415/101046.684027:ERROR:bus.cc(407)] Failed to connect to the bus: Failed to connect to socket /run/dbus/system_bus_socket: No such file or directory
```
